select.if: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT H.*, NVL(bCnt, 0) bCnt, lName FROM HOTEL H, LOCATION L, (SELECT HNAME, COUNT(*) bCnt FROM BOOKMARK GROUP BY HNAME) B WHERE H.HNAME = B.HNAME(+) AND H.LOCATIONNO = L.LOCATIONNO AND REQUESTSTATUS = 'A' ORDER BY bCnt DESC) A) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startrow} AND #{endrow}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT H.*, NVL(bCnt, 0) bCnt, lName FROM HOTEL H, LOCATION L, (SELECT HNAME, COUNT(*) bCnt FROM BOOKMARK GROUP BY HNAME) B WHERE H.HNAME = B.HNAME(+) AND H.LOCATIONNO = L.LOCATIONNO AND REQUESTSTATUS = 'A' AND H.HNAME LIKE '%'||#{schword}||'%' ORDER BY bCnt DESC) A) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startrow} AND #{endrow}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT H.*, NVL(bCnt, 0) bCnt, lName FROM HOTEL H, LOCATION L, (SELECT HNAME, COUNT(*) bCnt FROM BOOKMARK GROUP BY HNAME) B WHERE H.HNAME = B.HNAME(+) AND H.LOCATIONNO = L.LOCATIONNO AND REQUESTSTATUS = 'A' AND H.LOCATIONNO = #{locationno} ORDER BY bCnt DESC) A) WHERE RN BETWEEN 1 AND 3

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT H.*, NVL(bCnt, 0) bCnt, lName FROM HOTEL H, (SELECT HNAME, COUNT(*) bCnt FROM BOOKMARK GROUP BY HNAME) B WHERE H.HNAME = B.HNAME(+) AND REQUESTSTATUS = 'A' AND H.LOCATIONNO = #{locationno} AND H.HNAME LIKE '%'||#{schword}||'%' ORDER BY bCnt DESC) A) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startrow} AND #{endrow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOTEL WHERE HNAME LIKE '%'||#{schword||'%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOTEL WHERE LOCATIONNO = #{locationno}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOTEL WHERE HNAME LIKE '%'||#{schword}||'%' AND LOCATIONNO = #{locationno}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HOTEL (HNAME, BID, LOCATIONNO, HADDR, HTEL, HLINK, HINFO, INTIME, OUTTIME, HMAINIMG, HSUBIMG_1, HSUBIMG_2, HSUBIMG_3, HLATITUDE, HLONGITUDE, HPRICE) VALUES (#{hname}, #{bid}, #{locationno}, #{haddr}, #{htel}, #{hlink}, #{hinfo}, #{intime}, #{outtime}, #{hmainimg}, #{hsubimg_1}, #{hsubimg_2}, #{hsubimg_3}, #{hlatitude}, #{hlongitude}, #{hprice})
mapper.update: UPDATE HOTEL SET LOCATIONNO = #{locationno}, HADDR = #{haddr}, HTEL = #{htel}, HLINK = #{hlink}, HINFO = #{hinfo}, INTIME = #{intime}, OUTTIME = #{outtime}, HMAINIMG = #{hmainimg}, HSUBIMG_1 = #{hsubimg_1}, HSUBIMG_2 = #{hsubimg_2}, HSUBIMG_3 = #{hsubimg_3}, HLATITUDE = #{hlatitude}, HLONGITUDE = #{hlongitude}, HPRICE = #{hprice} WHERE HNAME = #{hname}
